message: My chest is warm.
I lay my hand over my heart. Its beat is steady and strong.

name: 蓮
message: "He went back inside of you."
Ren is standing next to me.

name: 蓮
message: "He could return to you because you accepted him."

name: 蒼葉
message: "...You're okay?"

name: 蓮
message: "Yes. You recognized me as having my own will separate from yours."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Okay."
I'm glad to hear that Ren won't go.
The other me has rejoined my consciousness. That's what he wanted.
But Sei...
He wanted freedom.
I granted his wish... but in doing so, I ensured that I would never see him again.
We finally found each other, and yet...
Tears burn at the corners of my eyes.

name: 蓮
message: "Aoba..."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Maybe... Maybe I could've saved him... Maybe I could have saved Sei somehow..."

name: 蓮
message: "...Remember what he said. Try to see things from every perspective."

name: 蓮
message: "I imagine this was salvation to him."
If only I could've gotten to Sei sooner...
If only we hadn't been born with these powers...
I could spend the rest of my life wondering what might have been.
But this is our reality. I'm sure... there was no other way.
I wipe the tears from my face.
In the silence, I hear the gentle sound of waves breaking on the shore.
The twilight scene is identical to the place from my dreams.
A gentle breeze passes between us, carrying the faint scent of the tide.
My heart aches.

name: 蒼葉
message: "...It's beautiful."

name: 蓮
message: "Yes."

name: 蒼葉
message: "This memory means a lot to me. I'm glad I could share it with you."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Though it's probably not your first time, huh? You've always been with me, so you must've seen it back then."
Ren's hand touches my cheek.
He gazes at me for a moment... then suddenly pulls me into his embrace.
